Query SDWIS by PSID

get_data.Rd

Query the SDWIS database by a public water system ID (PSID), start and end date, and analyte.

get_data(psid, start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, analyte = NULL)

Arguments

psid

The public water system ID to be queried.
start_date

The starting date for queried results.
end_date

The end date for queried results.
analyte

A single analyte to return.

Value

A data.table of analyte results for the input PSID and date range.

Examples

d <- get_data("103039")
#> Error in data.table::fread(url): To read gz and bz2 files directly, fread() requires 'R.utils' package which cannot be found. Please install 'R.utils' using 'install.packages('R.utils')'.
head(d)
#> Error in head(d): object 'd' not found
